entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • warning NETSDK1004: Assets file '/root/.nuget/packages/system.threaing.tasks/4.3.0/ref/netstandard1.3/System.Threading.Tasks.xml not found #29659
  • Using PublishSingleFile and IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract on macOS causes a "Class PlaceholderObject is implemented in both" warning #29658

Closed

  • The dotnet pack doesn't work together with -p:NuspecProperties when multiple properties provided #29661

PullRequests

Created

  • Upgrade helix queues #29660
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • add class templates #29655
    Area-dotnet new, Area-Common templates
  • Adjust conditional params tests #29645
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Templates
  • Move Template Discovery Test from dotnet/templating to dotnet/sdk #29628
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the macOs version #29644
    Area-Infrastructure
